sourcesContent:
const DriveModal = ({ drive, onClose }) => (

Vaccination Drive Overview

{/* Vaccine Information */}
Vaccine Information

Vaccine Name:{' '} {drive.vaccine}

{/* Drive Date */}
Scheduled Date

Date of Drive:{' '} {new Date(drive.date).toLocaleDateString(undefined, { year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric', })}

{/* Doses Info */}
Dosage Details

Available Doses:{' '} {drive.doses}

{/* Targeted Classes */}
Eligible Classes

Applicable for:{' '} {drive.classes}

); export default DriveModal;
